rules_text:
Ward–Sacrifice a permanent.
Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Hayat, Hungering Bakhtak.
Surpass {4}{B}{G} [i]({4}{B}{G}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
special_text2:
As this permanent transforms into The All-Consuming Swarm, counters on The All-Consuming Swarm become loyalty counters instead.
[+2]: Create three 1/1 black and green Insect creature tokens with flying.
[-3]: For each permanent type, each opponent sacrifices a permanent of that type.
​
